bibl.title: Forms and Genres of Alexandrian Exegesis on Lyric Poets. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Revised version of a contribution to the colloquium "La parola del poeta e la parola dell'interprete. Eruditi e grammatici nella cultura greca antica", organized by Franco MONTANARI at the "Fondation Hardt pour l'Étude de l'Antiquité Classique", Vandoeuvres (Geneva), 2nd-5th September 2008. - On the basis of the surviving ancient exegesis on lyric poets - especially Alcaeus, Archilochus and Anacreon -, pursues the aim of examining the different genres of scholarship attested in the papyrological tradition and identifying the characteristics of its original readers and 'users'.
bibl.seg: PORRO Antonietta, Forms and Genres of Alexandrian Exegesis on Lyric Poets. Avec résumé en anglais.
